articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Democrats look to hold Republicans accountable on Senate trial
articles.description: Senator Chris Van Hollen talks with Rachel Maddow about how Senate Democrats plan to hold Republicans to account with votes even as Mitch McConnell seems intent on running Donald Trump's Senate impeachment trial without regard for the wishes of his Democratic…

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Plane crash in Iran shows signs of more than mechanical failure
articles.description: Jeff Guzzetti, former NTSB investigator and FAA accident investigation chief, talks with Rachel Maddow about why the outward indications about the passenger plane that crashed in Iran the night Iran launched missile attacks against bases in Iraq, suggest more…

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Congress unimpressed by Trump admin explanation for Iran attack
articles.description: Rachel Maddow rounds up the reactions of some members of Congress who were less than impressed with the Trump administration's briefings on what imminent threat required the killing of Iranian General Qassem Soleimani without consulting Congress on the use of…

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Growing body of impeachment evidence adds pressure on Senate GOP
articles.description: Rachel Maddow reviews the extensive new evidence that has come to light about Donald Trump's Ukraine scandal in the days since he was impeached over that scandal by a House that did not have the benefit of that evidence, and notes that as documents continue t…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Sen. Graham likens Trump's Iran speech to Reagan's 'tear down this wall' speech
articles.description: Responding to Graham's comments, fmr. RNC Chairman Michael Steele says Gramam is "smoking stuff none of us should get their hands on."

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Is Trump's fight with Iran over for good... or just for now?
articles.description: What comes next between Washington and Tehran? We discuss the very latest with our panel.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Speaker Pelosi Not Backing Down on Impeachment
articles.description: Lawrence O’Donnell talks with Jonathan Alter and Joy Reid about the pressure Speaker Pelosi has put on Mitch McConnell and Republican senators by demanding a fair impeachment trial.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Katyal: McConnell trying to hide the truth
articles.description: Former Acting U.S. Solicitor General Neal Katyal tells Lawrence O’Donnell that Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell is afraid of what Former National Security Adviser John Bolton could say about President Trump during the impeachment trial.
articles.content: Former Acting U.S. Solicitor General Neal Katyal tells Lawrence ODonnell that Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell is afraid of what Former National Security Adviser John Bolton could say about President Trump during the impeachment trial.Jan. 9, 2020

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: John Kerry: Other admins considering killing Soleimani, but...
articles.description: John Kerry tells Lawrence O’Donnell that it was "always an option" to take out Soleimani, through several administrations, but "people made a judgment that the cost of doing so was not going to change the dynamic sufficiently that it was worth that cost becau…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: How many Republicans will vote to limit Trump's war-making powers against Iran?
articles.description: Trump faces an effort on Capitol Hill to limit his ability to strike out at Iran. We discuss with our panel.

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Hardball 1/8/20
articles.description: Chris Matthews and a panel of guests discuss the political news of the day.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Day 1,084: Lawmakers split over intel as Trump backs away from fight with Iran
articles.description: Some Republicans are blasting the intelligence briefing they got over Soleimani's assassination as Trump seems to walk back from more violence with Tehran.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: John Kerry fact checks Trump's lies about the Iran deal
articles.description: Trump continues to repeat false claims about the Iran nuclear deal, including his oft-told lie that Iran received $150 billion from the U.S. in that deal. John Kerry tells Lawrence "it is an outright lie by the president."
articles.content: Trump continues to repeat false claims about the Iran nuclear deal, including his oft-told lie that Iran received $150 billion from the U.S. in that deal. John Kerry tells Lawrence "it is an outright lie by the president."Jan. 9, 2020
